last_episode_to_air.name: The Well
last_episode_to_air.overview: Viva's lovers (John Neville, John Michael Bolger) duel; Timmy (Shawn Phelan) goes for help for the trapped lassie; whose dream of hell may be a premonition.

name: Grand
overview: Grand is a half-hour situation comedy that aired on the NBC network in 1990. The series featured an ensemble cast including Pamela Reed, Bonnie Hunt, Michael McKean, John Randolph, Andrew Lauer, John Neville, Joel Murray and Sara Rue. It was created by Michael Leeson, executive produced by Leeson, Marcy Carsey and Tom Werner. Grand ran for 25 episodes, from January 18 to December 27, 1990.
